title: Threshold
description: Schema to define interpretation thresholds for metric scores within a task context.

task.description: Task ID to which these thresholds apply.

thresholds.description: Mapping from metric IDs to arrays of threshold ranges and labels.

label.description: Human-readable interpretation label for this threshold range.

min.description: Inclusive minimum value for this range. Optional if only max is set.

max.description: Exclusive maximum value for this range. Optional if only min is set.

interpretation.description: Optional detailed explanation of what this threshold range means.
